resources.string:
Exotica, in its 12th year 
 promise to live up to its name,
 implying invigorating, boundless energy.
 The Annual TechFest of
Nalanda Institute Of Technology,
 Bhubaneswar
 is our biggest and grandest college festivals.
 Year after year,
it has been evolving,
 reinventing itself in leaps and bounds.
 Every year, Exotica throws participants
 newer an unprecedented challenges,
 sets new standards, leaving the
 participants awestruck.
 It is no wonder that Exotica has
 gained the kind of Recognition it has,
 in such a short time span.

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: What are the types of events in Exotica?\n
How can you download our app?\n
Is there any special arrangements of bus for girls during DJ night of Exotica?\n

string-array.name: answer1
string-array.item:
Exotica,
The Annual Techno-Management Fest of
 Nalanda Institute of Technology, Bhubaneswar is our biggest college festival.
 It will span for 5 days.
 The spirit of Exotica lies in encouraging sound practices, making precision engineering a way of life,
 Effectively bringing about a paradigm shift from classroom to path-breaking innovation.

string-array.name: answer2
string-array.item: Exotica is a plethora of many events. It includes branch events, gaming events, formal events,fun events etc.\n

string-array.name: answer3
string-array.item: You can get register through our website www.TheExotica2k18.in or you can get register in our TheExotica 2k18 android app https://goo.gl/R5cJCx\n

string-array.name: answer4
string-array.item: You can download our TheExotica 2k18 app from Google playstore.\n

string-array.name: answer5
string-array.item: No,there will not be online events.\n

string-array.name: answer6
string-array.item: Yes! Girls would be provided a BUS and a special mirror environment after the Sunset.\n

string-array.name: answer7
string-array.item:
